document_data.caption: A map showing Maeruhal in eastern Halruaa.
document_data.name: Maeruhal
document_data.mainbody: '''Maeruhal''' was a small city located in eastern [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Description: Maeruhal was a small settlement located within close proximity to the famed [[electrum]] mines of Halruaa.
document_data.Defenses:
Five [[Halruaan Skyship|skyships]] were permanently docked in Maeruhal. All of them belonged to Halruaan Elders.

In addition to the skyships, Maeruhal boasted two companies of elite [[dwarven]] warriors.
document_data.Inhabitants: The renowned craftsman, [[Boronuil Ironfist]] made his home in Maeruhal
